author: pnever
msg: Fixed error in expected value of REPORT step.

author: cmlenz
msg: Use the new, proper method for determining the absolute path of an object

author: cmlenz
msg: Deprecate the PropertyHelper.getAbsoluteURL() method, it doesn't work in
non-default configurations. See my previous commit for more info.

author: cmlenz
msg: Added a new static method WebdavUtils.getAbsolutePath().
This method should replace PropertyHelper.getAbsoluteURI(), because it (a)
takes the scope into account and (b) takes the servlet-path into account
when the servlet init-param 'default-servlet' is set to false.
Using the new method instead of the old one will make the WebdavServlet
actually work when it is not the default-servlet and/or the scope parameter
I will deprecate the PropertyHelper.getAbsoluteURI() method and will start
replacing it's usage, but it's being used all over the place.
